info.title: Survey API Documentation
info.description: L5 Swagger OpenApi description for business project

post.summary: Resend email verification token
post.description: Resend email verification token to user's email address

message.example: Verification email has been sent. Please check your inbox.
No user found with this email address
Failed to send verification email. Please try again later.

post.summary: Register a new user
post.description: Register a new user with email and password

get.summary: Get authenticated user with business details
get.description: Retrieve the currently authenticated user's information including business and roles

post.summary: Authenticate user login
post.description: Authenticate user with email and password, returns access token on success

403.description: Account locked or email not verified

message.example: Account locked due to 5 failed login attempts. Please reset your password or wait 15 minutes.

post.summary: Verify user PIN
post.description: Verify the PIN for a specific user (users can only verify their own PIN)

message.example: No PIN set for this user

get.summary: Get authenticated user details
get.description: Retrieve the currently authenticated user's information including business, roles, and permissions

get.summary: Get users with optional pagination and search
get.description: Retrieve users with optional pagination and search functionality

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of users per page (optional, if not provided returns all users)

message.example: Invalid per_page value. Must be between 1 and 100

post.summary: This method is to check user
post.description: This method is to check user

get.summary: Get all branches for the authenticated user's businesses
get.description: Retrieve a list of all branches belonging to businesses owned by the authenticated user.

post.summary: Create a new branch
post.description: Create a new branch for a business. Only business owners can perform this action.

is_geo_enabled.description: Whether geolocation is enabled for the branch

403.description: Forbidden - Not business owner or super admin

message.example: You do not have permission to create branches for this business

get.summary: Get a specific branch by ID
get.description: Retrieve details of a specific branch. Only business owners can access branches of their businesses.

403.description: Forbidden - Not business owner or super admin

message.example: You do not have permission to view this branch

delete.description: Delete a specific branch. Only business owners or super admins can delete branches of their businesses.

403.description: Forbidden - Not business owner or super admin

message.example: You do not have permission to delete this branch

patch.summary: Update a specific branch
patch.description: Update details of a specific branch. Only business owners or super admins can update branches of their businesses.

is_geo_enabled.description: Whether geolocation is enabled for the branch

403.description: Forbidden - Not business owner or super admin

message.example: You do not have permission to update this branch

patch.summary: Toggle branch active status
patch.description: Toggle the active status of a specific branch.

message.example: You do not own this branch

get.summary: Get all businesses with optional filters and pagination
get.description: Retrieve a list of all businesses with optional search and filtering capabilities. Supports both paginated and non-paginated responses.

parameters.name: search_key
parameters.description: Search term to filter businesses by name

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of items per page (if pagination is required)

parameters.name: response_type
parameters.description: Export format (PDF, CSV, or JSON by default)

parameters.name: file_name
parameters.description: Custom filename for PDF/CSV export (without extension)

meta.description: Pagination metadata (only when per_page is provided)

post.summary: Store a new business
post.description: Create a new business with the provided details

post.summary: Store a new business by specifying owner ID
post.description: Create a new business with the provided details and specified owner ID

delete.summary: Delete business by ID (Super Admin only)
delete.description: Delete a business and its associated daily views. Only super admins can perform this action.

message.example: You do not have permission to delete businesses

delete.summary: Force delete business by email (Super Admin only - within 5 minutes of creation)
delete.description: Force delete a business and all its associated data by email address. Only super admins can perform this action, and only if the business was created within the last 5 minutes.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email address of the business to force delete

message.example: Business and all associated data force deleted successfully
You do not have permission to force delete businesses

422.description: Business is too old to force delete

message.example: Business can only be force deleted within 5 minutes of creation

post.summary: Upload business logo image
post.description: Upload and update the logo image for a specific business. Only business owners or super admins can perform this action.

logo.description: Image file to upload (jpeg, png, jpg, gif, svg - max 2MB)

403.description: Forbidden - Not business owner or super admin

message.example: You do not have permission to update this business

get.summary: Get business details by ID
get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific business including owner information

patch.description: This method is to update business

get.summary: Get businesses for client view with ratings and timing
get.description: Retrieve businesses with calculated ratings, timing information, and optional pagination

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of items per page (if pagination is required)

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Field to sort by (e.g., Name, Address, created_at)

parameters.name: search_key
parameters.description: Search term to filter businesses by name

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date for filtering reviews (Y-m-d format)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date for filtering reviews (Y-m-d format)

meta.description: Pagination metadata (only when per_page is provided)

get.summary: Get business with tables by business ID
get.description: Retrieve business information including associated tables and owner details

get.description: This method is to get business times

get.summary: Get customers with advanced filtering and pagination
get.description: Retrieve a list of customers with various filtering options including ratings, reviews, frequency visits, and pagination support

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of customers per page for pagination

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Field to sort by (e.g., first_Name, last_Name, email, created_at)

parameters.name: rating
parameters.description: Filter customers by their review rating (1-5)

parameters.name: review_keyword
parameters.description: Keyword to search within review comments

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter customers by first or last name

parameters.name: search_key
parameters.description: General search term for name, email, or phone

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Filter customers created after this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Filter customers created before this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

meta.description: Pagination metadata (only when per_page is provided)

post.summary: Create a daily view record for a business
post.description: Create a new daily view record for the specified business. Only business owners or super admins can perform this action.

view_date.description: Date of the daily view in YYYY-MM-DD format

403.description: Forbidden - Not business owner or super admin

message.example: You do not have permission to create daily views for this business

patch.summary: Update daily views for a business
patch.description: Increment the daily view count for the specified business and date. Only business owners or super admins can perform this action.

view_date.description: Date of the daily view in YYYY-MM-DD format

403.description: Forbidden - Not business owner or super admin

message.example: You do not have permission to update daily views for this business

404.description: Resource not found - Business not found or daily view not found for this date

message.example: Business not found or Daily view not found for this date

get.summary: Get all dashboard data combined
get.description: Retrieves combined dashboard data for business owners, including customer analytics by period

parameters.name: customer_date_filter
parameters.description: Customer date filter (allowed values: today, this_week, this_month, next_week, next_month, previous_week, previous_month)

401.description: Unauthorized - User is not a business user

message.example: You are not a business user

get.summary: Retrieve review questions
get.description:
Fetches review questions based on user role and filters.

 Superadmin: Gets all questions (default + all businesses)
 Business Owner: Gets default questions + their own business questions
 Use query parameters to filter results (all optional)

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Filter questions by business ID. Ignored for superadmin.

parameters.name: is_user
parameters.description: Show only questions visible to registered users (show_in_user = true)

parameters.name: exclude_user
parameters.description: Exclude questions visible to registered users (show_in_user = false)

parameters.name: is_guest_user
parameters.description: Show only questions visible to guest users

parameters.name: exclude_guest_user
parameters.description: Exclude questions visible to guest users

parameters.name: survey_id
parameters.description: Filter questions attached to a specific survey

parameters.name: survey_name
parameters.description: Filter questions by survey name (partial match)

question.example: How likely are you to recommend us?

post.summary: Store a new review question
post.description: Creates a new review question. Superadmin creates default questions (business_id = null). Regular users can only create for their own business.

400.description: Bad request / Business not owned / Questions disabled

get.summary: Get a specific review question
get.description: Retrieves a single review question by ID. Access depends on user role.

403.description: Forbidden - No access to this question

patch.summary: Update an existing review question
patch.description: Updates a review question. Superadmin can update default questions. Regular users can only update questions for their own business.

400.description: Bad request / Business not owned / Questions disabled

delete.description: Deletes one or more review questions. IDs can be comma-separated. Superadmin can delete default questions. Business owners can only delete their own business questions.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Question IDs to delete (comma-separated for multiple)

400.description: Bad request - Invalid IDs or no access to questions

404.description: One or more questions not found

get.summary: Get all questions for a business (client-facing)
get.description: Retrieves all active questions for a specific business. Supports filtering by survey and overall flag. Includes star ratings and associated tags.

stars.description: Rating options with tags (e.g. for star type questions)

message.example: Business not found or invalid survey_id

patch.summary: Set questions as overall and make all others non-overall
patch.description: This method marks selected questions as overall and updates all other questions for the same business to non-overall.

question_ids.description: Array of question IDs to set as overall

patch.summary: Toggle question active status
patch.description: Updates the `is_active` status of a question. Only super admins can modify default questions.

patch.summary: Order questions by specific sequence
patch.description: Update the display order of questions using order numbers

post.summary: Update question stars and tags
post.description: Update the stars associated with a question and the tags under each star.

message.example: Question Stars and Tags updated successfully

parameters.name: has_reply
parameters.description: Filter by replies: true=replied, false=not replied

get.summary: Get all tags
get.description: Returns tags based on user role and optional filters. Superadmin gets only default tags (business_id=null, is_default=1). Non-superadmin gets business tags (business_id=business_id, is_default=0) plus default tags (business_id=null, is_default=1).

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Business ID. Required for non-superadmin users. Ignored for superadmin (superadmin always receives default tags).

parameters.name: is_active
parameters.description: Filter by active status (0/1 or true/false).

422.description: Validation error (e.g., business_id missing for non-superadmin)

404.description: Business not found (when business_id provided but invalid)

post.summary: Create a tag
post.description: Creates a new tag. business_id can be null. If user is superadmin and business_id is empty, server may set is_default=true.

get.summary: Get a tag by id

patch.summary: Update a tag

delete.description: Delete multiple tags by comma-separated ids. Example: /v1.0/tags/1,2,3 . If any id does not exist, nothing is deleted and 404 is returned with missing_ids.

404.description: Some ids not found (no deletion performed)

message.example: Some tag ids were not found.
Invalid ids format. Use comma-separated integers like: 1,2,3

post.summary: Create multiple tags for a business
post.description: Creates multiple tags at once. For superadmin: creates default tags (business_id=null, is_default=1). For non-superadmin: creates business tags (business_id={businessId}, is_default=0). If any tag already exists (business tag or default tag), the API returns 409 with duplicate_indexes and does not create anything.

tags.description: Array of tag strings (duplicates will be removed before checking/creating).

duplicate_indexes.description: Indexes of duplicates based on the unique tag list (after duplicates removed).

post.summary: This method is to store tag
post.description: This method is to store tag

post.summary: Store multiple tags for a business
post.description: Create multiple tags at once for a specific business. Checks for duplicate tags and validates business ownership.

message.example: You do not own this business
